          <title>
            <string language="en">Reaction of a driver before pressing the brake pedal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reaktion eines Treibers, bevor das Bremspedal 
betätigt wird</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction d'un gestionnaire avant d'appuyer la 
pédale de freinage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação de um excitador antes de pressionar o 
pedal de freio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione di un driver prima della pressione del 
pedale del freno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίδραση ενός οδηγού πρίν πατά το πεντάλι φρένων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción de un programa piloto antes de 
presionar el pedal de freno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates how a driver reacts before pressing the brake pedal for a quick stop.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">speed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">driver</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction time</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stopping distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thinking distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie ein Treiber reagiert, 
bevor er das Bremspedal für einen schnellen Anschlag betätigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre comment un 
gestionnaire réagit avant d'appuyer la pédale de freinage pour un 
arrêt rapide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra como um excitador 
reage antes de pressionar o pedal de freio para um batente rápido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra come un driver 
reagisce prima della pressione del pedale del freno per un arresto 
rapido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει πώς ένας οδηγός 
αντιδρά πρίν πατά το πεντάλι φρένων για μια γρήγορη στάση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra cómo un programa 
piloto reacciona antes de presionar el pedal de freno para una parada 
rápida.</string>
          </description>
